sys_update_set.description: Faster resolution for Security Incident Response (SIR) tickets by integrating with xMatters Flow Designer. Automatically contacts the Assignment Group via xMatters. Pre-Requisites 1 Everbridge Flow Designer app for ServiceNow, available from the ServiceNow store. 2 Access to an xMatters instance with admin rights. See xMatters labs on Github for installation notes.
sys_update_set.name: xMatters Security Incident Response
